text: Hawk tuah is a viral internet meme started by Hailey Welch. In a street interview with Vox Pop in 2024, she said "You gotta give em that Hawk Tuah spit on that thang." After it was posted on YouTube the clip went viral on social media websites. "You gotta give 'em that 'hawk tuah' and spit on that ," means spitting on a man's penis during oral sex. From her fame Hailey Welch has created a Podcast called “Talk Tuah” where her and her group of friends talk about current events with special guests. == References == Category:Internet memes Category:Sexual slang
title: Hawk tuah
